languages.text: {n}Устройства хранят свою тайну от вас — природа ксенотеха настолько порочна, что вам не удается разгадать назначение этих устройств. В следующую секунду вы слышите, как Маражай захлопывает контейнер и поднимается с места.{/n}

{n}The devices withhold their secrets from you — the nature of the xenotech is so depraved that you are unable to discern the purpose of these tools. A moment later, you hear Marazhai slam a container shut and stand up.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Устройства хранят свою тайну от вас — природа ксенотеха настолько порочна, что вам не удается разгадать назначение этих устройств. В следующую секунду вы слышите, как Маражай захлопывает контейнер и поднимается с места.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The devices withhold their secrets from you — the nature of the xenotech is so depraved that you are unable to discern the purpose of these tools. A moment later, you hear Marazhai slam a container shut and stand up.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}The devices withhold their secrets from you — the nature of the xenotech is so depraved that you are unable to discern the purpose of these tools. A moment later, you hear Marazhai slam a container shut and stand up.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}你无法看穿这些装置的秘密。这些异形科技的本质实在是过于邪恶，你根本无法辨别这些工具的用途。片刻之后，你听到玛拉斋摔上了某个容器的盖子，站起了身。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The devices withhold their secrets from you — the nature of the xenotech is so depraved that you are unable to discern the purpose of these tools. A moment later, you hear Marazhai slam a container shut and stand up.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你无法看穿这些装置的秘密。这些异形科技的本质实在是过于邪恶，你根本无法辨别这些工具的用途。片刻之后，你听到玛拉斋摔上了某个容器的盖子，站起了身。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}装置はこちらに秘密を明かさない。異星技術の性質は道徳から大きく外れており、この道具達の目的を理解することができないのだ。次の瞬間、マラズハイがコンテナをバタンと閉め、立ち上がる音が聞こえた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The devices withhold their secrets from you — the nature of the xenotech is so depraved that you are unable to discern the purpose of these tools. A moment later, you hear Marazhai slam a container shut and stand up.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}装置はこちらに秘密を明かさない。異星技術の性質は道徳から大きく外れており、この道具達の目的を理解することができないのだ。次の瞬間、マラズハイがコンテナをバタンと閉め、立ち上がる音が聞こえた。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Los artefactos te niegan sus secretos; la naturaleza de la xenotecnología se te antoja tan depravada que eres incapaz de discernir su propósito. Al cabo de unos instantes, oyes que Marazhai cierra de golpe un contenedor y se pone en pie.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The devices withhold their secrets from you — the nature of the xenotech is so depraved that you are unable to discern the purpose of these tools. A moment later, you hear Marazhai slam a container shut and stand up.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los artefactos te niegan sus secretos; la naturaleza de la xenotecnología se te antoja tan depravada que eres incapaz de discernir su propósito. Al cabo de unos instantes, oyes que Marazhai cierra de golpe un contenedor y se pone en pie.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Les secrets de ces étranges appareils vous échappent. Et pour cause, la xénotechnologie est dépravée par nature, à tel point que vous seriez bien incapable de comprendre l'utilité de ces instruments. Un instant plus tard, Marazhai referme un conteneur avec fracas avant de se relever.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The devices withhold their secrets from you — the nature of the xenotech is so depraved that you are unable to discern the purpose of these tools. A moment later, you hear Marazhai slam a container shut and stand up.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les secrets de ces étranges appareils vous échappent. Et pour cause, la xénotech est dépravée par nature, à tel point que vous seriez bien incapable de comprendre l'utilité de ces instruments. Un instant plus tard, Marazhai referme un conteneur avec fracas avant de se relever.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Die Geheimnisse dieser Geräte bleiben dir verborgen – das Wesen von Xenotech ist so verdorben, dass es dir nicht möglich ist, den Zweck dieser Werkzeuge auszumachen. Kurz darauf hört ihr, wie Marazhai einen Container zuschlägt und dann aufsteht.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The devices withhold their secrets from you — the nature of the xenotech is so depraved that you are unable to discern the purpose of these tools. A moment later, you hear Marazhai slam a container shut and stand up.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Geheimnisse dieser Geräte bleiben dir verborgen – das Wesen von Xenotech ist so verdorben, dass es dir nicht möglich ist, den Zweck dieser Werkzeuge auszumachen. Kurz darauf hört ihr, wie Marazhai einen Container zuschlägt und dann aufsteht.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cihazlar, sırlarını senden saklıyor. Zeno teknolojisinin tabiatı öylesine bozuk ki bu araçların amaçlarını kavramayı başaramıyorsun. Bir süre sonra Marazhai'ın konteyneri kapatıp ayağa dikildiğini duyuyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The devices withhold their secrets from you — the nature of the xenotech is so depraved that you are unable to discern the purpose of these tools. A moment later, you hear Marazhai slam a container shut and stand up.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cihazlar, sırlarını senden saklıyorlar. Zeno teknolojisinin tabiatı öylesine bozuk ki bu araçların amaçlarını kavramayı başaramıyorsun. Bir süre sonra Marazhai'ın konteyneri kapatıp ayağa dikildiğini duyuyorsun.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
